definition: to knock at the gate (old)/to make an approach/to invade/to attack the goal (sports)
mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve

sentences.english: In what ways was the coming of Perry a turning point in late Tokugawa history?
sentences.chinese: 培理叩關在哪些方面是德川幕府晚期歷史的轉捩點？
